availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of George S. Forsee and Matilda Forsee. Married to Henrietta Threlkeld Forsee in Owen County, Kentucky, on May 16, 1864. Father of George T. Forsee. Farmer in Owen County in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Owen County in 1850. Farmer in Owen County in 1860. Household owned eleven enslaved persons in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272776, p. 117.
Find A Grave, "John Jamison Forsee (1831-1887)," Memorial #70716248, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/70716248 (accessed February 25, 2020).
